item.title: How to Set Up Static Hugo Blog
item.description:
hugo theme: nostylesplease

steps

  • install hugo
  • clone theme
  • add post
  • publish/connect to github pages

learning

  • how to use md
  • how to set folder/directory/files structure.
  • toml
  • yml to publish/deploy github pages
  • how to set favicon
